resources.string: We at FoodBucket are committed to deliver hygienic and quality Meal for College/Hostel students at a very affordable price. To ensure the quality in our cuisine, we take orders until 12 PM in the afternoon for lunch and 8 PM in the evening for dinner. This gives us time to prepare and serve you with the best deal. \nFor any kind of enquiry or problem with the order, you can mail us to

with your order no. and food details. We would love to help you. The Colleges where we deliver are IIIT, BGU, IMI. For any Food description, just click on the Food item in the list. \n\nTeam Food Bucket.
